MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut WA16 postcode area of Knutsford. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:25PM. Our engineers are on site to make repairs and reerrect a grounded overhead line. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We now expect the power to be restored by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:35PM on 21st January 2021.
